attributes.name: Reputation
attributes.description: Impacts relations and affinity with strangers. Gain better cuts of rewards, though expectations become higher. Every 100 points increases Reputation Roll by +1.

attributes.name: Empathy
attributes.description: Impacts ability to work well with allies and reap better non-Eurodollar rewards. Modified by certain player actions. Helps prevent Cyber Psychosis.

attributes.name: Appeal
attributes.description: Base rating of how much you appeal to others.

attributes.name: Performance
attributes.description: Skill of performing in front of others, such as singing, acting, playing an instrument, or speaking.

attributes.name: Crafting
attributes.description: Ability to craft items properly. Knowledge is required to craft certain items. Higher crafting allows for rarer and stronger items.

attributes.name: Evasion
attributes.description: Skill of not being noticed or seen.

attributes.name: Intimidation
attributes.description: Base rating of your ability to intimidate others. The floor to succeeding Intimidation checks starts at 1 unless the other party has a negative trait reducing this.

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.description: Allows you to expend Luck to ensure a skill succeeds once per session. Can also guarantee a crit attack.

attributes.name: Perception
attributes.description: Negates from Evasion during Evasion-related checks.

attributes.name: Persuasion
attributes.description: Base rating of your ability to persuade others. The floor to succeeding Persuasion checks starts at 1 unless the other party has a negative trait reducing this.

attributes.name: Tolerance
attributes.description: Ability to handle pain and the effects of drugs.
